com.here.android.mpa.ar

Interface ARController.OnPoseListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ARController

    public static interface ARController.OnPoseListener
    Listener for pose update events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPose(ARPoseReading pose)
      A callback indicating that the pose has been updated.

    • Method Detail

      • onPose

        void onPose(ARPoseReading pose)
        A callback indicating that the pose has been updated. This can be triggered by the user moving the device (tilting, rotating or changing position).
        Parameters:
        pose - An ARPoseReading representing the new pose
